column2: Crossing Main Line to Southbury Loop

column1: Down train from Lea Valley arrives intoCheshunt platform 2
column2: Up train departs Cheshunt platform 1 towardsSouthbury

column1: Depart Platform 2 via preferred route (routecode DS) towards Bury Street Junction
column2: Arrive/Pass Platform 2 or 3 from Bury StreetJunction (not having stopped at CheshuntJunction Signal L1395)
Arrive/Pass Platform 2 from Bury StreetJunction (not having stopped at CheshuntJunction Signal L1395)
Arrive Platform 3 (not having stopped atCheshunt Junction Signal L1395)

column1: Depart Platform 2 via preferred route (routecode DS) towards Bury Street Junction orDepart Platform 3
column2: Arrive/Pass Platform 2 or Arrive Platform 3 fromstop at Cheshunt Junction Signal L1395

column1: If a train is starting from Platform 2 and routed via the preferred route (line code DS) towards Bury Street Junctionthis will conflict with the overlap of signal L1395 on the Down Southbury approaching Cheshunt, so it is notpossible for a train to depart from Theobalds Grove towards L1395. This also applies to a departure from Platform3 (see margins above).If a train is starting from Platform 2 and routed via the non-preferred route (line code UC) towards Bury StreetJunction that this will conflicts with the overlap of signal L1060 on Platform 1.
Depart Platform 2 via non-preferred route(route code UC) towards Bury Street Junction
